title: Good deal here - T206 Carl Lundgren KC

posts.post_title: Good deal here - T206 Carl Lundgren KC
posts.post_content: For Sale - T206 Carl Lundgren P350 - SGC 4.5   $260 via venmo friends or $267.50 via pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested.
Doesn't fit my set-build...but great deal on a great looking card 👍
